description:
Ringo and her friends have a face-off with Tsugumi, another Wish fan, in front of a CD store. The reason for this incident is that neither could get the last handshake ticket for Wish. A heated argument ensues: “It’s your fault that I can’t meet Wish!” “That’s our line!”. The argument derails and they end up starting a competition to see who can get Wish’s autograph first. They all try different methods to get his autograph, however, it’s not as easy as they think. Depressed, Tsugumi sighs: “Wish…  I only have two more days…”. Apparently Tsugumi has a reason why she absolutely has to get Wish’s autograph…
Source: crunchyroll
